lines.text: [Harry is under the influence of a truth serum]
Is there anything you'd like to tell me before we start?
Yeah. I'm going to kill you pretty soon.
I see. How, exactly?
First I'm going to use you as a human shield. Then I'm going to kill this guard over here with the Patterson trocar on the table. And then I was thinking about breaking your neck.
And what makes you think you can do all that?
You know my handcuffs?
Mmm-hmm.

[holds up his hands]
I picked them.
[Samir gasps. Harry springs up from his chair and grabs Samir, using him as a shield while he kills the guard, then breaks Samir's neck]
Have you ever killed anyone?
Yeah, but they were all bad.
[while launching a Harrier missile, from which Salim Abu Aziz is hanging]
You're fired!

Same thing happened to me with wife number two, 'member? I have no idea nothing's going on, right? I come home one day and the house is empty, and I mean completely empty. She even took the ice cube trays out of the freezer. What kind of a sick bitch takes the ICE CUBE trays out of the FREEZER?

[holding Simon at the edge of an aquaduct]
Son of a bitch, Did you think you can elude us forever, Carlos, huh?
Hey, you got the wrong guy! My name's Simon! Just let me go. There's no need to kill me. I haven't seen your...
[Harry and Gib remove their masks]
face. No, no, no I didn't see it, I didn't see it!
[realizes that it is Harry]
Oh, it's you! Hey, you still interested in that 'Vette at all?
Hey, Carlos? Game's over. Your career as an international terrorist is well documented.
No...
-Oh, yeah.
No...
Oh, yeah!
No!
OH, YEAH!
No, I sell cars! That's all! C'mon, I'm not a terrorist. I'm actually a complete coward, if I ever saw a gun, I'd...
[Harry takes his gun out and points it in Simon's face]

[Whining and pleading]
Oh God, no, please don't kill me. I'm not a spy. I'm nothing. I'm navel lint! I have to lie to women to get laid, and I don't score much. I got a little dick, it's pathetic!
[Harry and Gib gave Simon a weird look, then Simon pees his pants]
Wha, uh, oh God. Would a spy pee himself, huh? Please, I'm not worth a bullet. Oh, mercy sir!

[Disgusted]
Get the fuck out of here. Just go, just beat it.
No, no, as soon as I turn, you're gonna shoot me! You're gonna shoot me, you're gonna shoot me, you're gonna shoot me!

[Gib and Harry get into their van]
Get lost, dipshit.
[fires a few rounds into the ground near Simon]
[after watching her husband kill dozens of men]
I married Rambo!
[Salim Abu Aziz reveals a nuclear weapon]
Do you know what this is?
I know what this is...
[Salim smiles]
This is an espresso machine.
[Salim frowns]
No, no wait. It's a snow cone maker.
[Salim approaches Harry]
Is it a water heater?
Women. Can't live with 'em. Can't kill 'em!

[hitting on a woman at the party]
Here, let me pour you some more champaigne. I gotta keep up the waiter bit, these stakeouts can be a little tricky you know, you never know if things can explode to a life or death situation, just stay low and I'll contact you later. Maybe you should give me your tele...

[puts his hand in Simon]
So, we meet again Carlos.

[puts her lipstick case under Simon's chin]
Honey, I'm gonna do him right here.

[proudly]
Go for it.
Oh god.
[pees in his pants]
Fear is not an option.
[Simon runs out of the party nervously screaming]
[to Dana, who's wearing a helmet]
Yeah, I remember the first time I got shot out of a cannon.

[the van is slipping on ice]
Hey, watch it.
It's called ice, and it gets a little slick.
Did you read the papers yesterday?
Yes.
Sometimes a story's a mask for a covert operation. See "Two men killed in a restroom and two unidentified men in a running shootout ending at the Marriot."
That was you.
[listening to their conversation with Gib]
You see...

[whispers to Gib]
That was me.
You're very good. You recognize my style. You're a natural at this.
The guy's a fake, man. He's taking credit for our moves.
What happened?
Hardly worth talking about. Two of them won't bother me again.
Unbelievable!
You chased one?
Something came over me. I just had to nail this guy no matter what the risk. Pretty hairy. I thought he had me a couple of times. But I can't take credit.
Why not?
It's the training. It shapes you into a lethal instrument. You react in a microsecond without thinking.

[laughing]
I'm startin' to like this guy.
[Harry gives him a mean look]

[gets serious]
We still gotta kill him. That's a given. You know.
[Simon attempting to have sex with Helen]
No, I can't. I can't!
[Simon still persuing]
If not for me, Helen, do it for your country!
[about Harry's daughter]
Do you think she's still a virgin?
Dont be ridiculous, she's only - -what is she now?
She's fourteen!
She's fourteen years old!
Yeah, and her little hormones are going off like a car alarm.
[Harry has just returned from Helen's office and is shell-shocked]
Helen... Helen...
Helen...?
Helen...
It's got something to do with Helen, I'm guessing.
Helen...
Helen... is having an affair!
Welcome to the club, man!
They call him the Sand Spider.
Why?
Probably because it sounds scary.
You tell on me, I tell on you.
What are you talking about, I'm as clean as a preacher's sheets. I'm as clean as...
What about that time you blew a six-week operation because you were too busy getting a blow job?
You knew about that?
Uh-huh.
[last lines]
You know what? I'm sick of being in the van. You guys are going to be in the van next time. I've been in the van for 15 years, Harry.

What do women really want? You take these bored housewives, married to the same guy for years, they're stuck in a rut, then need some release! Promise of adventure, a hint of danger. I create that for them.
So basically, your lying your ass off the whole time. See, I can't do that.
What are you, a boy scout? No, no, no, think of it as playing a role as fantasy. I mean, you got to work on their dreams. Get them out of their daily surburban grind for a few hours.
But what about their husbands?
Dickless! I mean, let's face it, if they took care of business, I'd be out of business! You know what I mean?
[laughs]

[fake laughs]
Those idiots!
Can you hurry up. My horse is getting tired.
Your horse?
So who are you working on right now?
I always got a few on the line. But there's this one chick I got right now. I got her panting like a dog. Its great.
What does she do?
Some sort of legal secretary. Married to some boring jerk.
Married to some boring jerk.

Aww, but she could be so hot if she wanted to. She's like all these babes, you get their pilot lit, they could suck start a leafblower. And she's got the most incredible body too and a pair of titties that make you wanna stand up and beg for buttermilk. Ass like a ten year old boy! AHAHAHAHA!

[Harry punches him in the face instantly breaking Simon's neck and the daydream ends]
AHAHAHAHAHA!

[trying to translate for Helen what Aziz is saying]
In 90 minutes, the holy fire, will light up the skies.
[the terrorists are covering the nuclear warhead with an american flag and cement]
We will tell the the whole world, that we speak, the truth. No force can stop us now, we're cool, we're badasses, blah, blah, blah.
Honey, if we're on an island, why are they using trucks?
We must be in the Florida Keys. These are the islands that have highways that connect the islands to the mainland.
There's no borders, no customs. They can go anywhere in the U.S. They're will be no one to stop them.
But, us. Here take this
[hands Helen an Uzi]
Oh, shit.

[Loopy from the truth serum he's been given]
Ask me a question I would normally lie to.
Are we gonna die?
Yep!
I'd say it's working.
They're gonna shoot us in the head or they gonna torture us to death or they gonna leave us here when the bomb blows up...
Harry!
Kids - 10 seconds of joy, 30 years of misery.
Let's face it. The 'Vette... gets 'em wet!

[trying to sell Harry a Corvette]
You see, it's not just a car. It's a total image. An identity you have to go for. This isn't some high-tech sports car. Tell you the truth, it doesn't even handle that great. But that's not the idea, is it? What are we talking about here? Pussy, right?

[fake laughs]
Absolutely.
Let's face it, Harry. The 'Vette gets 'em wet.
The code name of your assignment will be... Boris. And your code name will be...

[hopeful]
Natasha?
No... Doris.
Care to tango?
Yes, I would.
Assholes.

[over radio]
All right twinkle toes, what's your exit strategy?
I'm gonna walk right out of the front gate.

[over radio]
Ballsy. Stupid but ballsy.
Can I see your invitation?
Sure, here's my invitation.
[blows shed sky-high]
[Harry is reading the tapped phone conversations from Helen, notices something, and quickly pulls the car over to the side of the road and up onto the curb]
My turn to drive?
Give me the page!
What?
This jumps from page 9 to page 11.

[looks at paper]
Must be a typo.

[shouts]
Give me the goddamn page!
[smashes passenger side window with his bare fist]

[Gib looks at the window, and quickly grabs page 10 from his coat]
OK.

[confessing on why she wants to go with Simon to Paris]
I wanted to do something outrageous, and it felt really good, to be needed, and to be trusted. It's just there's so much I want to do with this life and it fells that I haven't done any of it. You know, the sand is running out of the hourglass, ao I want to look back and say, see, I did that, that was me, I was wreckless and I was wild, and I fucking did it.
I have to lie to women to get laid. Even then I don't score much. I got a little dick, it's pathetic!
The guy is a goddamn used car salesman!
[amused]
I mean, this just keeps getting better and better!
[Harry gives him a dirty look]
I'm sorry, Harry, I know this has got to be painful. But you gotta admit, it's pretty damn funny. I mean, if it was just some idiot and not you, you'd be laughing your ass off.
[starts to laugh]
[talking about Harry Tasker's wife, in a car with Simon]
Oh yeah, she's got her head in the guy's lap all right. Yahoo.
[to Harry Tasker]
Maybe she's sleepy.
So your life's in the crapper. So you wife is banging a used car salesman - it's humiliating, I know. But goddamnit, Harry, take it like a man!

[Hacking into a computer]
Yes! Files are unlocked! Fast Faisil strikes again. I'm doing, man! I've got my hand up her skirt, and I AM GOIN...
Just copy the goddam files, OK?
[Harry returns to the van after escaping the castle]
Hi guys.
Well that worked real good. Right out the old front gate.
Can you lean back a second...
[Harry shoots two remaining pursuers]
Harry? Harry? You do not have time to tango, buddy. You copy?
Well, you see, this is the problem with terrorists. They're really inconsiderate when it comes to people's schedules.
[Harry sticks an unconscious terrorist's head in a bathroom urinal and flushes it]
Cool off.
[Harry lights up a cigarette and starts coughing]
Dickhead.
Blow me.

[when Harry tells Gib to tap Helen's phone]
Ok, I've got two words for that. In. Sane.
You aren't her parents anymore, her parents are Axl Rose and Madonna, you can't compete with that kind of bombardment.
What can I say? I'm a spy.

[talking to Helen in a disguised voice]
If you don't complete your mission, the deal is off
[hangs up the phone]
I'm going to hell.

[filming his video when the cameraman abruptly lowers the camera]
What's the problem?
Batter-Aziz!
Take her! Take her! Oh, god, don't hurt me!

[to Harry, who thinks his wife is having an affair]
Hey, Harry. Listen, Helen still loves you. You know, she just wants to bang this guy for a while. You know? It's nothing serious. You'll get used to it soon...

[slams him up against a car]
Stop cheering me up!
Put a tap on her phone.
What are you talking about? I already did that.
I'm talking about Helen's. Put a tap on her office line and the line to my house. Do it NOW.
Okay. All right. Just come over her. Sounds great. I just wanna ask you about something.
[takes him aside]
I got two words to describe that idea, in-sane. An unauthorized wire tap is a felony, pard...

[slams him up against the wall]
And we're doing it twenty times a day! So don't give me that crap.
There *is* no us, you psychopathic bitch!

[his message to the United States]
You have murdered our women, and our children, and bombed our cities from afar, like cowards, and you dare to call "us" terrorists?Now, we have the ability to strike back at our enemies. Unless "you" "America" pull all military forces out of the Persian gulf area, immediately, and forever, Crimson Jihad will rain fire on one major U.S. city each week, until our demands are met. First, we will detonate one nuclear weapon on this uninhabited island as a demonstration of our power. But, if these demands are not met, Crimson Jihad will rain fire on one major U.S. city each week.
Ok, Suzie Homemaker. Let's go.
Seconds count buddy. Ditch the bitch.
[Harry becomes angered when he discovers that Helen may be having an affair]
What did you expect, Harry? Helen's a flesh and blood woman and you're never there. It was only a matter of time.
It's called ice and it gets a little slick.
[Harry is commandeering a Harrier to rescue his daughter]
Harry, do you realize it has, in fact, been 10 years since you've been behind the wheel of one of these things?
If I break it, they can take it outta my pay.
Sweet Jesus, Harry, you surely screwed the pooch last night, didn't you?
So far, this is not blowing my skirt up, gentlemen.
It's a scale really, with a perfect mission at one end and a total pooch screw at the other, and we're right about in the middle.
You're new on Harry's team, aren't you?
Yes.
So what makes you think that the slack I cut him in anyway translates to you?

[translating the terrorist celebrations for Helen]
... We're cool, we're badasses, blah, blah, blah.
Federal officer! Get down now! Duck or Die!

You know what? I say we concentrate on work, buddy. That's what I do every time my life turns to dog shit. I concentrate on work, and that gets me by. All right, buddy? This is gonna be great. You know what? We're gonna catch some terrorists, we're gonna beat the crap out of them, you're gonna feel a hell of a lot better.
